name: Fantaria: The Quest for Sausage Kickstarter Demo
name_original: Fantaria: The Quest for Sausage Kickstarter Demo
description:
Hello!  Most likely you got here from the Kickstarter campaign, but if not, this is the page for the Kickstarter demo of the collectathon/FPS hybrid known as Fantaria: The Quest for Sausage.  You can find out more at the Kickstarter by clicking here, or you can just download the demo and check it out by clicking below!

Credits:

  • Music: Viv
  • UI and Kickstarter Art: Scandrë
  • Additional Sound Effects from zapsplat.com
